website_summaries.verdict: A premium supplement that helps people maintain normal cholesterol levels, bolster the immune system, and much more.
pros: Has been shown to help people keep their blood pressure under control and reduce elevated blood pressure within days after first use
Contains parsley seed to help freshen the breath
cons: Some garlic burps may occur after initial use

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle supplement. I am 42 and I do have history of high blood pressure since I was 33. I don’t want to take maintenance medicine because of side effect that I am feeling. But ever since I took this supplement, I never have to worry about my blood pressure. NORMAL . Period! This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: mrs_whitney

customer_reviews.title: Contains soy!
customer_reviews.text: Contains soy. This is not stated in the description of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Kilmury

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing. I am 68 years old and very active
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I am 68 years old and very active. Yet my blood pressure went from 120 /68 to 134/68. I have taken the product for less than a month and verified by three readings at different doctors. 110/60. Pretty impressive change. Worth a try because blood pressure meds can have bad effects.
customer_reviews.author: bx

customer_reviews.title: The label does not tell the truth
customer_reviews.text: It does indeed cause uncomfortable burping with the uneasy feeling of heartburn. It us extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Cookes Daus

customer_reviews.title: Best Garlic Supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best garlic supplement i've tried...I decided to purchase this due to my high cholesterol and also my high blood pressure..My total cholesterol was around 280, after taking the supplement it went down to 220...My diastolic was around 85-90 and now its at a steady 80....Definitely will buy again...i feel awesome
customer_reviews.author: Paulson Kung (State Farm)

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! Absolutely seen amazing results within a month. I’ve always had issues with my blood pressure running high 150/80 and now when I take my blood pressure the numbers are 128/87. I’m highly impressed and recommend to those who suffer with high blood pressure and hypertension.
customer_reviews.author: Bria S

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product if you have food sensitivities!!! It’s based in soybean oil!! Why in the world would a health supplement company be so stupid as to base an item like this in one of the top 12 allergens?!? It’s not eligible for return, so this product will be going directly in to my trash. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: festivewalker

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I have taken garlic supplements in the past, and regulary eat garlic. For some reason withing roughly 45 minutes of taking these for the first time, i broke out in a rash on face and my throat started to tickle. I had to grab the Benedryl and pray it didn't get worse. I noticed these are green - in the past the ones I've taken were clear or slightly yellow. I don't know if that had anything to do with it, but I can't take them. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This product is unbelievable I’ve only used for about a month and boy does it work. I stopped my high blood pressure medicine due to all the side affects it can cause. I began taking 2 Garlic softgels and take my blood pressure two to three time a week and it is actually lower then when I was on my prescribed medication. Will order again and again thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Prach

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito help
customer_reviews.text: Moving to a humid climate bright a lot of challenges/adjustments for my husband and I. One of the things we didn't expect was getting giant welts from mosquito bites. After a little research, it seemed like garlic capsules might provide some relief - and they do! We take them daily and rarely get bitten any more. Garlic has a lot of other benefits, but this has been far been our favorite benefit yet. Note: do make sure that you take these with food unless you like having garlic burps all day
customer_reviews.author: Heather Plett

customer_reviews.title: heartburn
customer_reviews.text: Product gave me massive heartburn every time about 20 minutes ingesting it.
customer_reviews.author: SEB

customer_reviews.title: Powerful tiny pill
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a garlic supplement to help with my immunity while pregnant and my ongoing issues with acne. I have tried several and enjoy this brand. I like how it includes parsley in case you are concerned about bad breath. The pill is small and easy to take. I have not noticed any garlic taste/burps but do notice the benefits when taking these pills.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Useless for lowering BP. It doesn't smell, it didn't do anything for me (not even burps). I have no clue what it does.
customer_reviews.text: Zero burp , zero side effects, it felt like I was taking nothing! I was taking Dr Zhou for lowering my blood pressure and it was working very well. I switched to this and the BP went up again. I don't hate it (hence my 2 stars) but it was a waste of money for me. Back to Dr Zhou If you are taking it for something else (not BP lowering) then ignore my comment.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I dropped from 190/108 to 126/82 in about 8 days!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Berenson

customer_reviews.title: I've tried their other products which I love but this one just doesn't agree with me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product cause I've tried some of their others ones before which I loved, but my family history of IBS did not fair well. This garlic was to strong for me I had to switch to a 500mg. So if you have a history of ibs, diarrhea you should be a little careful! But if you don't then try it! Cause their other supplements are wonderful. It just depends on your body though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I take 4 a day
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I take 4 a day. No garlic taste or burps. You will never have a yeast/Candida issue again. And mosquitos and other outside bugs completely leave you alone!!! YAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.T

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere that taking garlic pills would help in preventing yeast infections and it sure has. I now take them everyday and have not had a yeast infection ever since. These pills are wonderful and don't leave a garlic taste or smell on your breath! Must try for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Heart disease runs in my family. Both of my paternal grandparents have had heart attacks and my father has taken prescriptions for high blood pressure for over 20 years. In an effort to combat the potential genetic issues that may arise in my life, I determined to find a healthier preventative as I prefer to stay away from "drugs" if possible. I am not too sure of the effectiveness yet as I started taking them relatively recently. I can, however, tell you about my experience taking them. They are small, easy to swallow, and have no aftertaste. The bottle itself hardly even smells. I have never even burped up garlic. Overall, from what I can tell, a win.
customer_reviews.author: jmoertle21

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: After suffering from preeclampsia from the birth of my daughter, my blood pressure remained elevated. My doctor told me the preeclampsia brought out an underlying high blood pressure condition, which runs in my family. I decided to try the all natural method to bring it down, because I couldn't tolerate the meds i was on. Within a couple of weeks, my blood pressure went from 154/90 and now stays roughly 110/70, and I couldn't be happier. Not to mention, my resting heart rate has stayed about 54! Definitely doesn't hurt to try if you're suffering from blood pressure issues...plus, the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McNicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great (updated) it didn’t lower my blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I started taking them the other day no garlic burps or heartburn! So much more convenient then swallowing cloves of garlic. I will be ordering more and update my review once I’ve been taking them a while. Update : I’ve been using these for a few weeks now and I haven’t seen a change in my blood pressure. I think I will try a garlic pill that contains allicin. On a plus It does help repeal insects. 3rd Update: it lowers my blood pressure if I take 5 pills at a time so I’m giving it 4 stars the dosage should be stronger to see a different in blood pressure
customer_reviews.author: Reverie

customer_reviews.title: Best Garlic Supplement I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I love these little green garlic pills. They're easy to swallow and I haven't experienced any bad stomach effects or aftertaste from taking these. I hope they help lower my cholesterol, along with diet & excercise. Time will tell, but I really like these over over brands I've tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have been off BP medicine for 3 months and my BP is normal and no side effects like from medicine.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: All the softgels are attached to each other. It ...
customer_reviews.text: All the softgels are attached to each other. It appears it was exposed to extended time of heat and they melted and bound together. I tried to return, it says this item is not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Karo Karapetyan

customer_reviews.title: No return or refund
customer_reviews.text: This product has no effect,and when I want to return it,Amazon says it is not eligible to return.It is a waste of money.Be aware before you order it because you are going to lose your money and no refund.
customer_reviews.author: abe

customer_reviews.title: Dont believe everything you read.
customer_reviews.text: The sales pitch claims no taste and easy refund. Neither was true. I was burping up garlic and when I asked for refund thru amazon, it was no go.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Bad 2nd experience. Garlic burps.
customer_reviews.text: The 1st purchase went ok but the second bottle gave me uncomfortable garlic burps after taking them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Desmaras

customer_reviews.title: My son and I both started taking this supplement in ...
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both started taking this supplement in Fall 2017. We didn't get more than the sniffles all winter, even though the flu went around school and after school care. My cholesterol used to be around 220, is now in the 190s. Side benefit: my son's preteen BO has almost totally gone away. I can still tell if he forgets to put on his deodorant, but his feet and body don't have that adolescent funk any more.
customer_reviews.author: New Mom

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective versus competitor, garlic burps
customer_reviews.text: I was using another brand of garlic supplement and noticing consistently improved blood flow in all the right places as well as a decrease in my resting heart rate. Unfortunately, this product provides no such benefits and I find myself burping garlic often which never happened with the other. I bought this because of labdoor, unfortunately, it appears ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: datalikeme

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with this garlic!
customer_reviews.text: Made my stomach upset even when taking it with meals...
customer_reviews.author: StevieBoy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suppliment
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product! I am always very skeptical about supplements working better than medication and this does. I can say I use to have high blood pressure 155/100. I average now between 115-130. I suggest anyone with high blood pressure to give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Suarez

customer_reviews.title: They really work
customer_reviews.text: I bought the garlic pills to try them to see if they actually lower blood pressure and they do. I started off with 2 and now I take 3 a day and I see the effects. It lowers the systolic and diastolic numbers. However I also exercise too. They are truely odorless. I never smell like nor taste garlic. They're awesome. I will be buying more when I finish the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Wallace

customer_reviews.title: The best there is
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this product for over a year now and I swear this is the only thing that keeps me alive. I work with the public everyday of my life and this keeps me from catching all of the germs and viruses that people carry, also It gives an added bonus of allowing me to spend as much time outdoors as I want without the annoyance of mosquito bites I highly recommend this to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: XF

customer_reviews.title: They are also so easy to swallow because they are small
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to help with his blood pressure. His blood pressure has been lower since taking it. Will keep buying this. They are also so easy to swallow because they are small. That is an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Edith Bice

customer_reviews.title: I believe these work.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 40 years old, I've been on High blood pressure meds since i was 18. My blood pressure us usually in the 120-130 over 90s range. I never recall it being lower than 120/80 I've been taking these for 6 months, my checkup the other day my blood pressure was 108/67. I couldn't believe it so they checked my other arm, 110/ 67. I was shocked, it wasnt till after my appointment I started thinking about these pills. I paid full price for every bottle I've got
customer_reviews.author: Palooka

customer_reviews.title: For gut health
customer_reviews.text: This product is not difficult to take, very small gel pills, no repeating noticed (burping). Use it to ward off pylori germ.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Best burp less ,restless pils.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good especially that my husband doesn’t like garlic it’s burp free there is no after taste but the working side will take a little time to see if it works in three months when we go back to the doctor to have the blood test will see how it works but as a shopping experience very good and I like that they are small gel pills easy to swallow especially that some people are having hard time to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Curly

customer_reviews.title: Might have been great! But with endometriosis I can't have soy products ...
customer_reviews.text: Might have been great! But with endometriosis I can't have soy products and it was not written where I purchased that it contains soy. Not so great!
customer_reviews.author: Star Shower

customer_reviews.title: This totally helps with High Blood pressure. Add this ...
customer_reviews.text: This totally helps with High Blood pressure . Add this and a Tomato pill to your Vitamin intake is my recommendation :)
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Hustles

customer_reviews.title: Evidence-based results proven consistent to lower BP
customer_reviews.text: I researched best quality and potency of Garlic supplements before trying this one. It lowered my Blood pressure by 20 points within 3 days, back within normal range. (I didn't have any other health issues affecting blood pressure). Initially I noticed the slightest hint of garlic flavor in my mouth, but it disappeared after the first week. Been taking this over a year now with consistent results.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Fake free bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two bottles so far of this garlic supplement. I have ordered two bottles so far of this garlic supplement. Can’t say it’s any better than any others I have had. The second bottle came with a label saying get a free bottle on it but when I went to claim the free bottle, the promotion had already ended. Either the promotion lasted only a couple weeks or this was false advertising. Either way very shady on the company. I will buy a different garlic from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S.

customer_reviews.title: I will try another brand next time....
customer_reviews.text: I have taken two daily as recommended for a couple weeks now, at first I had no issue with garlic burps. Now I noticed the last couple days after taking them if i burp i taste the garlic. Luckily I actually like garlic, so it doesn't kill me but I still don't want to taste it when taking a supplement. I may as well just eat a raw clove .. I will try another brand next time and see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: NOT GARLIC BURF FREE
customer_reviews.text: Product description says that this garlic supplement is "burp free" and includes the statement "we set out to create an amazing burp less garlic supplement". I'd say the failed ! I burp garlic for hours after taking the supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Russell R. Weldon

customer_reviews.title: Helps with UTI's
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to lower my blood pressure, and had the added benefit of curing a urinary tract infection! The only drawback is that it kills off healthy bacteria too, so I have to remember to take my probiotics!!! I also love the tiny size of the pills, they are easy to swallow, no odors or garlic burps either!
customer_reviews.author: Twelve selves

customer_reviews.title: Odorless and Easy to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: Great garlic pills! I am pregnant and having issues with burping up garlic pills, which trigger morning sickness. These are indeed odorless and easy to swallow. I have never burped them up. I will be buying again when this bottle is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous website?
customer_reviews.text: Tried to access the BRI Nutrition website and got a "Dangerous Web Page Blocked" alert from Norton Security. Something seems not right. Update: Only blocked on Firefox. Chrome is OK. Customer Service was good.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eltzroth

customer_reviews.title: Wards off mosquitoes black flies maybe even ticks.
customer_reviews.text: We live in an area where there are plenty of mosquitoes and black flies. Since I have been using this product I have hardly been bothered. Honestly my husband is out in the yard with me and he is being really ( bugged ) .LOL . Not by me by the bugs. I don't take it for cholesterol issues but I do have those issues. I'm taking it to ward off mosquitoes and ticks. I don't think it's working for horseflies. No burping. Evidently enough oder to bother the bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Ended up taking  for  High Blood Pressure  so far  so good  after tryouts trying several .
customer_reviews.author: notsofast

customer_reviews.title: The Odorless Garlic works!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product for several months now. It is superior quality and just flat works. The only issue I have had with this BRI Nutrition Odorless Garlic, is my fault. If I rush off without eating a bit when I take my Garlic, I will taste it a little bit until I actually eat a bit. It works, It is a good quality, arrives on time and is a good price! Try it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising - prepare for severe indigestion burps
customer_reviews.text: The product description claims that this is a "burpless garlic supplement", but within minutes of taking the supplement, I could not stop having extremely uncomfortable garlic burps for about 8 hours. It was so disgusting that it made me feel nauseous. I will not be taking them again.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: An good way to take garlic without the smell or taste.
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE: Another seller that offers a free bottle if you write a review, and then doesn’t send you a bottle.* So far, so good. Very easy to swallow and helps keep me healthy when family members get sick.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Timber

customer_reviews.title: Had to Toss! Gave Me Disgusting Garlic Burps
customer_reviews.text: Had to toss this item out. It gave me the most nauseating garlicky burps. It might work It might help reduce the blood pressure, but that violent nausea is more than I could bear. I'll just buy fresh garlic and stick with that.
customer_reviews.author: C.T

customer_reviews.title: Taking for ear pain, crackling, fluid in ears
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have been having a lot of ear troubles for several years. I thought, what the heck, lets try it. I can't say my symptoms are cured entirely, but I will say: I was feeling super dizzy, that has subsided. I can hear much better, and my ear aches aren't as severe. I take them about 30 minutes after I eat breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Good for bloodnpressure
customer_reviews.text: I have been a longtime daily user of GARLIC supplements, and this stuff is several levels above the cheap stuff you find in local grocery stores. It is very powerful, you can 'taste' the garlic after taking it. I find that if I take garlic 2x a day, I generally am able to avoid colds and flu, while those around me at the office are coughing and hacking. I recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Tried it but went back to the previous option
customer_reviews.text: So I was using standardized garlic tabs and tried this with the parsley addition. Not bad, but the gel tiny pills were hard to pick up easy to go flying on to the kitchen floor. Also I noticed they were getting slightly stuck in my throat when swallowing...not from stickiness but the size seemed to get caught on the way down in the back of my throat. So while not extremely dissatisfied, I have gone back to the previous tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I found these and bought them because they were odorless and also because they were so small. I love that fact that you aren't taking a giant horse pill like some of the others that I have tried. I will buy again and again. Also the price is really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Q. Caserta

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to swallow!
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so I really feel it has helped boost my immune system this allergy season and this crazy weather we are still experiencing in California. It is super good quality, however, make sure you drink plenty of water and eat a meal when you take this because that garlic breath is kickin'. Just letting everyone know eat and drink lots of water to wash this down to avoid garlic burps.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Garcia

customer_reviews.title: “Happy Wife Happy Life...”
customer_reviews.text: My wife is happy with this product (extra strength odorless garlic by BRI nutrition). Because, aside from the health benefit and potentcy of this product, She also likes It being really “odorless” She also tried other odorless brand names (like GNC, Costco and others) but she still sense some odor on them; but she can’t feel the garlic odor on this one... so we have been a repeat-customer for sometime now... As a saying goes - “happy wife happy life”, then i guesss it’s a good Idea to stick to this one...
customer_reviews.author: jarcom

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I went in for a routine physical and was surprised to find out my blood pressure was high. Not wanting to go on medication I immediately started looking for natuaral alternatives and found out about garlic. This product had good reviews so I tried it. My blood presssure began to go down within 2 weeks. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: No joke IT WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are concerned about your blood pressure, this no joke works in 1 day and after about 2 weeks, I have a normal blood pressure. I was average 134/92 prior to this, and now I am 119/74 average. Just so that I do not mislead, I have cut down my intake of regular meat but definitely not stopped. I eat just a little more fish in my diet. Still eating carbs like rice but for real, this works!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: These are green - does not taste or smell like garlic oil
customer_reviews.text: Brought around 11-2019. Cut one open to be sure. Product does does not smell like garlic. Does not taste like garlic. It is some kind of oil, but might as well be motor oil as they are clear gels with green unknown oil on the inside. I've used a lot of garlic supplements to help my blood flow. I can tell when it works as I feel slightly warmer, hands don't tingle. These seem to do nothing and they are green which I'm guessing is due to a pretty extream age? or being something entirely different than garlic. Can not return product due to amazon yada yada yada rules.
customer_reviews.author: Chadaporn Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Valuable Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use garlic capsules to help my immune system in fighting colds and flu. Gave my 8 year old the garlic caps and Camu Camu (whole food vit c) and his earache was gone in a day or 2. The 18 mo old loves garlic caps and he runny nose cleared up quickly. My husband takes them daily for his blood pressure issues. We love the garlic caps!
customer_reviews.author: Al J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this is actually working but one thing that does work is the garlic burps that supposedly aren't supposed to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Pandorica

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. This product is amazing. I am 47 years old and very active. Yet my blood pressure went from 120 /68 to 134/68. I have taken the product for less than a month and verified by three readings at different doctors. 110/60. Pretty impressive change. Worth a try because blood pressure meds can have bad effects.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Georgiev

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are so small. And I don’t smell them I take Garlic pills all the time and only to brands and now I will use this brand. I don’t get a cold or flu during those times even if I’m around someone who is sick. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong Garlic odor. Lots of burping.
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the less than 5 * ratings . These pills have a strong Garlic smell and cause very bad garlic burps. How well does it work? I do not know yet, I have not had any blood work since I started using them. But right off the bat the claims about the pills seem to be false.
customer_reviews.author: StinkySkunkApe

customer_reviews.title: All the benefits without the afterbreath effects
customer_reviews.text: Was using another brand of garlic capsules that was deodorized but still had the nasty breath and burps after effect. I don't care how effective it is if it affects my social life, then I will look to a competitor and found this brand. It seems effective and I'm trusting it's claims and the quality I experienced with another of the company's products.
customer_reviews.author: Naturalhi

customer_reviews.title: Helped with heart pounding episodes and palpitations!
customer_reviews.text: When i began taking garlic supplements daily, I noticed that the heart pounding episodes and palpitations I had been experiencing had greatly diminished! Wow! What a great benefit!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gail

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: BP was in DANGER zone, now it's not! I swear to G--. I take 2 at night with no problems. No taste or after taste at all. First NORMAL BP in years. Haven't changed anything in my lifestyle other then taking these little pills!
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended using garlic supplements for a variety of health concerns. Garlic may help with reducing high blood pressure, cholesterol. Its also a great supplement for fighting inflamation. I really like the size of this capsule, there is no flavor or tasting garlic. I recommend this product if you are in the market to try an alternative to prescription medicine for any of your health concerns. Always check with your doctor first before starting something new.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bell

customer_reviews.title: Odorless
customer_reviews.text: Totally odorless. I've been taking these for about a week and there is no garlic odor or flavor to them at all. 2nd review. I started taking these for my cholesterol. Should know next month if they helped.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great garlic pill that changed in size, Why?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if these are benefiting me or not but i can say they are tiny and easy to swallow and they have absolutely no odor what so ever. This is an update, I have ordered my second bottle of garlic pills and these are much larger than the first bottle of garlic pills, these ore larger oval size where the first bottle was tiny small round, this was why I really liked them so much, Wow!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow, will help
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery,priced fair and very easy to swallow. Started with one for a week then increase dosage. Must take with food, easier on stomach. Have seen a small increase in how i feel,,better so am assuming after I increase will be a better outcome

customer_reviews.title: Loved that the supplements are odorless
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and powerful, helped with infections when I couldn't take antibiotics. Loved that the supplements are odorless, I couldn't take fresh garlic because of the harsh odor and was rough on my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bo

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I take these because of the health benefits, and mosquitos love me. It works for everything I need. However, I still get garlic burps. Then again, I've had worse burps from stuff that didn't have health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little
customer_reviews.text: These little gel tablets seem to help with my pressure first time in a long time was able to get my two year dot card in a while but definitely have to take regularly

customer_reviews.title: We’ve been here for a week and a half now and they seem to be working great! We haven’t gotten a single bug bite since ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought these because my girlfriend and I just moved to South Carolina from Washington and we needed some way to repel mosquitos without having to remember to wear bug spray everywhere we go. We’ve been here for a week and a half now and they seem to be working great! We haven’t gotten a single bug bite since taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Tyler Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for immune system, surprised as it lowered blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my immune system, but surprised as it lowered blood pressure from 135/85 to under 120/70 consistently. Trashed my other blood pressure herbs and am sticking with these. I only take one a day and it's so effective. Garlic also helps HDL cholesterol and keep clots from forming strokes. Make sure you're taking this and or olive leaf extract to maintain cardiovascular health as well as anti disease. Read the peer reviewed studies done on these herbs, amazing.

customer_reviews.text: Does not smell (in or out) it doesnt come out in a smell from my skin like others assume it would. Very small gel capsules easy to swallow and works very well

customer_reviews.title: I had a stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: I am a diabetic and i bought this product to lower my blood pressure and its Garlick it has a health benefits but from the day i started taking it , once a day in the morning i had stomach pain all the time , which after three days i thought i have gallbladder stone, i was almost going to ER which i thought to myself what did i do that i got this pain then i remembered that i added extra garlic supplement to my daily routine ,and when i stopped it the pain went away , so the product has probably some chemicals which creates stomach pain reaction .

customer_reviews.title: Soybean oil not disclosed on ad-Will not accept return of unopened box
customer_reviews.text: This product contains soybean oil. This information is not disclosed on Amazon, which is a real disservice to those of us for whom that information really matters. Further, although never opened, they do not allow a return on this product.

customer_reviews.title: Natural way to drop blood pressure....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pills to assist in naturally bringing my blood pressure down. I have found I do the best with it when I take one pill at a time and when I take it with acidic food (tomato sauce / salsa) or with milk (milk and muffin/ ice cream). So far my pressure is down 15 points (after a week of 2 pills per day).

product_meta.title: BRI Nutrition Odorless Garlic - 120 Softgels - 1000mg Pure and Potent Garlic Allium Sativum Supplement (Maximum Strength) - 60 Day Supply
feature_bullets: ★WHY US: We were sick of burping up garlic so we set out to create an amazing burp less garlic supplement. With garlic being a leading super food, there are hundreds of variations of garlic supplements now available in the market. However, at BRI Nutrition, we've developed what counts, and that is sourcing the finest ingredients.

★WHAT IT IS: Studies suggest that garlic can be an effective agent in improving our overall health.* Whether with regards to cardiovascular health issues, such as high blood pressure, cholesterol, or heart attacks.* It also aids our immune system and in circulation and digestion, and provides detox and cleanse abilities.* Garlic is made up of key compounds that contribute a variety of health benefits to the body. These compounds include allicin which the active ingredient in garlic.

★PURITY: We use only the finest ingredients, all of which are manufactured in our US, GMP compliant, state-of-the-art, facility. Every batch is laboratory tested for quality assurance. OUR GUARANTEE: We're very so confident that you'll love this product that we offer a 60-day, 100% money-back guarantee.

★COMMON NAMES: In many cases, you may encounter garlic referred to as Garlicin, Camphor of the Poor, Stinking Rose, or via its scientific name, Allium Sativum. Some competitors offer aged garlic extracts, garlic drops, garlic in liquid form, odorless garlic supplements, and even garlic complex to name a few.

★SHARE: Consider ordering one bottle for yourself and another for a friend or loved one. Keep each other motivated and reach your goals together and more quickly. BRI Nutrition stands by every quality product we make. We manufacture only premium vitamins, capsules, pills, tablets, powders, multivitamins, supplements, topical liquids, serums, vegan foods and extracts for men, women, and children. Check BRINutrition out today!
